overview: The ULTIMATE trout flyfishing DVD. An epic journey through the very best of Aotearoa's trout angling destinations. A full feature production all on the latest DVD 9 Dual layer disc. We cover the massive diversity of New Zealand's world famous waters from North to South. Complete with a 100% pure original Kiwi soundtrack and incredible action and stunning footage. A CLASSIC for any devoted angler or visitors keen to experience the very best of New Zealand's wilderness!
title: Destination Trout New Zealand
